<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Anubis (Guardian of the Tomb)](/Deities.aspx?ID=49)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Lay bodies to rest, destroy undead, be impartial in judgment

**Anathema** Desecrate a corpse, rob a tomb, trap a soul

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

**Favored Weapon** [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)

- **3rd**
[Shifting Sand](/Spells.aspx?ID=586)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)

</column>
name: Anubis (Guardian of the Tomb)
